name: Kodiak Flare Case
description: Transport your bangers and pen launcher. A secure, latched holder on the outside holds a banger and launcher fastened together. When latched, the launcher is locked in position to preventing firing.Waterproof case has a belt clip and carabiner.2 internal rows of storage, each row holds either 2 bangers or 3 flares.Space for one unloaded launcher on the inside.Secure latched storage for one loaded launcher on the outside.Desiccant bag glued in to remove moisture.
